contentList.content:
When a character performs an action that's true to their Background, they gain Experience Points and receive <LSTag Tooltip="Inspiration">Inspiration<LSTag Type="Image" Info="Inspiration"/></LSTag>. Inspiration may be spent to reroll an <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>.
You may only hold a single use of Inspiration. Once held, completing Background Goals only grants Experience.
